# pkgas

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Get objects from packages via abbreviations of packages and the $ operator.
The `%as%` operatoraAbbreviates a package.

## Installation

``` r
remotes::install_github("atusy/pkgas")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(pkgas)

# Abbreviate a package
graphics %as% gr

# Get plot function from graphics package
# The result is same as `graphics::plot`
gr$plot
```
